meanings: lose one´s way in the woods
be grieved over the loss of one´s son
be lost in admiration of a beauty
be captivated[charmed, enchanted] by a beauty

meanings.meaning: close, lock, etc. the stable door after the horse has bolted

vlive.korean: [소 잃고 외양간 득템] 교훈을 얻는 게 없잖아! [You lose a cow, and get a barn] There's no lesson. 듣기 View video TOMORROW X TOGETHER : TO DO X TOMORROW X TOGETHER 2020 - EP.7
vlive.english: [You lose a cow, and get a barn] There's no lesson.

vlive.korean: [(미안함에 음소거 미소)] 소 잃고 외양간을 잃으면 뭘 얻는데? [I'm sorry] What do you get if you lose a cow and a barn? 듣기 View video TOMORROW X TOGETHER : TO DO X TOMORROW X TOGETHER 2020 - EP.7
vlive.english: [I'm sorry] What do you get if you lose a cow and a barn?

vlive.korean: [이성 잃고 머리 좀 뽑았더니 엥 난 민머리가 됐어요] "헤헷 형 부럽죠?" [I plucked my hair and I turned bold] "Yay! Aren't you jealous?" 듣기 View video V PICK! : [ATEEZ] 우주에서 제일 호화로운 비쥬얼 파티🎉 장관이네요 절경이고요,,🤩✨ (Seonghwa&Yunho talking about behind episode)
vlive.english: [I plucked my hair and I turned bold] "Yay! Aren't you jealous?"

vlive.korean: [병차니의 큐트함에 정신을 잃고 만 와이파이] 안 돼! [Wifi is overwhelmed by ByungChan's cuteness] No! 듣기 View video V PICK! : [VICTON] 별도 달도 따다 주고 싶은 크고 확실한 행복을 세 글자로 줄이면 최병찬🐥🐶 (ByungChan talking about newly coined words)
vlive.english: [Wifi is overwhelmed by ByungChan's cuteness] No!

vlive.korean: [저는 이성도 잃고 자제력도 잃은 상태더라고요] [속닥] 파이팅! [I lost my senses and control] [Whispering] Let's go! 듣기 View video V PICK! : [BTS] 👤: 누구 좋아해요? 💜: 저 태태 좋아해요 그냥 막 좋아 죽어요 (V talking about his recent days)
vlive.english: [I lost my senses and control] [Whispering] Let's go!

examples.korean: He overbalanced and fell into the water. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그가 균형을 잃고 물속으로 빠졌다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: He overbalanced and fell into the water. Add to Wordbook

examples.english: The child was lost and began to whimper. Add to Wordbook

examples.english: He drifted aimlessly from one job to another. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: a storyteller who can hold audiences spellbound 듣기 Add to Wordbook 독자들이 넋을 잃고 몰두하게 만들 수 있는 작가 Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary

examples.korean: The driver lost control and veered to the nearside. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 운전자가 통제력을 잃고 길가 쪽으로 방향을 틀었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The driver lost control and veered to the nearside. Add to Wordbook
